蘊.definition: to accumulate; to hold in store; to contain; to gather together; to collect; depth; inner strength; profundity

蘊和.definition: to contain (e.g. poem contains feelings); contained in

蘊涵.definition: to contain; to accumulate; to embrace; implicit condition; implication; entailment

蘊聚.definition: to contain; to accumulate; to hold concealed

蘊藉.definition: implicit; restrained; to be imbued with

蘊藏.definition: to hold in store; to contain (untapped reserves etc)
